Assurance (Nature): May forgo rolling a Nature check for an automatic 38
Assurance (River Lore): May forgo rolling a River Lore check for an automatic 32
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Enduring Alchemy: Quick Alchemy products last until the end of next turn
Experienced Smuggler: Minimum 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item/Earn Income using Underworld Lore gives increased earnings
Impressive Performance: May use Performance to Make an Impression
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Infused Reagents: May create 18 batches of infused reagents each day
Intimidating Glare: May use glare to Demoralize
Quick Alchemy: (1) May use batches of infused reagents to create 1 alchemical item of up to level 18 for 1 turn
Raging Intimidation: May use Demoralize during rage
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 284 Armor Class: 37 (dexterity (4 max); expert) Class DC: Alchemist: 15 (intelligence; trained); Barbarian: 16 (strength; trained); Champion: 16 (dexterity; trained); Rogue: 36 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+28 1d4+4 P/S R10'; strength; master); Javelin (+28 1d6+4 P R30'; dexterity; master); Rapier (+28 1d6+4 P [Crit +d8]; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Alchemist Dedication: Attack Trained (Alchemical Bombs)/Class Trained (Alchemist)
Barbarian Dedication: Class Trained (Barbarian)
Barbarian Resiliency: +18 Hit Points
Champion Dedication: Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor)/Class Trained (Champion)
Champion Resiliency: +24 Hit Points
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +72
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Diverse Armor Expert: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Far Lobber: Bombs have 30' range
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Master Tricks: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Rogue Expertise: Class Expert (Rogue)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +18 Hit Points
Weapon Proficiency (Pick): Attack Trained (Pick)
Weapon Tricks: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Bestial Rage: Fist inflicts 1d12B HP during rage
Debilitating Strike: (F) May have a successful Strike against a flat-footed foe inflict choice of -10 Speed or enfeebled 1 until end of next turn
Defensive Roll: (F) May negate half damage from an attack that would reduce self to 0 HP 1/10 min
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed to foes of equal or lower level
Divine Ally (Blade): May apply choice of disrupting, ghost touch, returning, or shifting to a weapon chosen each day; also gains critical specialization effect
Double Debilitation: Debilitating Strike inflicts choice of two debilitations
Dread Striker: Frightened foes are flat-footed vs. self attacks
Glimpse Of Redemption: (R) R15' May negate damage to a struck ally or grant the ally damage resistance 20 and inflict enfeebled 2 on triggering foe for 1 rd (foe's choice)
Mobility: May Stride half Speed without triggering reactions
Powerful Sneak: May change sneak attack damage to match weapon type
Quick Draw: (1) May draw a weapon and Strike
Rage: (1) May gain 22 temporary Hit Points and +2 HP melee damage (agile weapon +1 HP), and suffer -1 AC and no concentration actions, for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Reactive Interference: (R) May prevent a foe Reaction; requires an attack against a higher-level foe
Scoundrel: A successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks (critical success all attacks) for until the end of next turn
Sneak Attack: +4d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or ranged weapons
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Tactical Debilitations: Debilitating Strike may prevent reactions or flanking
Twist The Knife: (1) May inflict 4 HP persistent bleed damage with a sneak attack
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Tricks: Critical hits vs. a flat-footed foe with unarmed attacks and agile, finesse, and rogue weapons inflict its critical specialization effect
Weight Of Guilt: May make Glimpse Of Redemption target stupefied instead of enfeebled
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +28 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Improved Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Juggernaut's Fortitude: Save Master (Fortitude)
Slippery Mind: Save Master (Will)
Cognitive Loophole: (R) May suppress a mental effect until the end of next turn
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Improved Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures/Suffers half normal damage from failed Reflex saves
Slippery Mind: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 2; D1: 2; D2: 2; D3: 2; D4: 2; D5: 2; D6: 1; D7: 1; O0: 2; O1: 2; O2: 2; O3: 2; O4: 2; O5: 2; O6: 1; O7: 1; P0: 2; P1: 2; P2: 2; P3: 2; P4: 2; P5: 2; P6: 1; P7: 1 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Divine: +28 (wisdom; master); Occult: +26 (charisma; master); Primal: +28 (wisdom; master) Spell DC: Divine: 38 (wisdom; master); Occult: 36 (charisma; master); Primal: 38 (wisdom; master)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' radius may substitute caster Performance roll for save
Goodberry (P1 Nec): (2) Eating touched berry within 10 min restores 1d6+4 HP (heightened +1 affects +1 berry)
Inspire Courage (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Lay On Hands (D1 Nec): (1) Restores 6 HP and gives +2 AC for 1 rd to touched living; undead suffers 1d6 HP and -2 AC for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts doubles HP) (heightened +1 +6 HP or +1d6 damage)
Magic Notes:
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Basic Bard Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level occult spell
Basic Cleric Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level divine spell
Basic Druid Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 3rd-level primal spell
Cleric Dedication: Spell Trained (Divine)/May prepare 2 divine cantrips each day
Counter Perform: Knows the Counter Performance spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Divine Breadth: +1 divine spell slot of each level up to 5
Druid Dedication: Spell Trained (Primal)/May prepare 2 primal cantrips each day
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Expert Bard Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Occult)/Knows 1 4th-level, 1 5th-level, and 1 6th-level occult spell
Expert Cleric Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Divine)/Knows 1 4th-level, 1 5th-level, and 1 6th-level divine spell
Expert Druid Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Primal)/Knows 1 4th-level, 1 5th-level, and 1 6th-level primal spell
Healing Touch: Knows the Lay On Hands spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Inspirational Performance: Knows the Inspire Courage cantrip
Master Bard Spellcasting: Spell Master (Occult)/Knows 1 7th-level occult spell
Master Cleric Spellcasting: Spell Master (Divine)/Knows 1 7th-level divine spell
Master Druid Spellcasting: Spell Master (Primal)/Knows 1 7th-level primal spell
Occult Breadth: +1 occult spell slot of each level up to 5
Order Spell: Knows the Goodberry spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Primal Breadth: +1 primal spell slot of each level up to 5
Magical Trickster: Spell attacks vs. flat-footed foes inflict sneak attack damage
Mercy: (1) Lay On Hands may also counteract choice of fear or paralysis
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 23 available vs. 59 allocated
